name: Mighty Rollers
description:
Place and roll dice supplied by your weapons to take down the monsters on the battlefield before your health runs out. If you make it out alive, you will receive a nice reward and a choice for your next fight.

Be aware that the final boss is quickly approaching...

Controls:

  • Left mouse - Select die
  • Hold right mouse - Inspect selected die
  • WASD - Move selected die

Credits:

  • Brian Burns - Design, Music, Programming
  • Benjamin Powell - Art
  • Clive Patrick - Design, Programming
